ResourceHeader.ResourceName: 38.2MHz Imaging Riometer at Syowa Station, Antarctica.
ResourceHeader.Description: 38.2MHz Imaging Riometer (IRIO) at Syowa Station, Antarctica. The IRIO has an 8x8-element dipole antenna array and produces 8x8 independent beams in an area of about 180km x 180km at the D region altitude.

Instrument.InvestigationName: Imaging Riometer Observation at Syowa Station
